text:
WebappClassLoader holds on to loaded classes otherwise gc'able.
E.g. Hibernate / Spring / cglib etc. create classes dynamically,
and those classes may become gc'able.

WebappClassLoader.resourceEntries should not directly reference those
classes, but wrap them in WeakReference objects.
creator: mschulz@dinmar.com

text:
More precisely, ResourceEntry holds on to the Class, while it should
use a WeakReference<Class> instead.

resourceEntries itself is OK in my mind.
